name: Tears of a Mermaid (Anime)
text:
If your opponent activates a face-down card or flips a monster face-up and you control a face-up WATER monster, activate 1 or both of these effects (simultaneously):
? Target 1 monster your opponent controls; its effects are negated and it cannot attack.
? Negate the activation of a Spell/Trap and destroy it.
